web_snippets: As a licensed psychologist and consultant, Dr. Karen Bridbord helps company founders and leadership teams build healthy, productive partnerships.
Dr. Karen Bridbord is a seasoned psychologist and consultant with over two decades of experience in organizational consulting and executive coaching.
